summary.para: Constructs this provider to use no credentials when making a new Blob Storage .
This instance will NOT use any credential when constructing the underlying Azure.Storage.Blobs client, e.g. . This is for the purpose of either anonymous access when constructing the client.

new Azure.Storage.DataMovement.Files.Shares.ShareFilesStorageResourceProvider : Azure.AzureSasCredential -> Azure.Storage.DataMovement.Files.Shares.ShareFilesStorageResourceProvider

Docs.param: SAS credential to use when constructing resources.

summary.para: Constructs this provider to use the given credential when making a new File Share .

This instance will use the given when constructing the underlying Azure.Storage.Files.Shares client, e.g. . The credential will only be used when the provider needs to construct a client in the first place. It will not be used when creating a from a pre-existing client, e.g. . Additionally, if the given target share resource already has a SAS token in the URI, that token will be preferred over this credential.
